turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order an espresso from the Hannah Building Starbucks on 1400 Euclid Avenue in Cleveland, Ohio.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what did you want to order from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A gingerbread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: looks like that's a seasonal item and is not currently being served. sorry about that, doyou want another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me see what I want to her.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I guess, can I just get the cinnamon shortbread latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A tall with Yeah, a whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u have a milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so, you want a tall hot cinnamon shortbread latte with whole milk ordered at the hannah building starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been placed. it'll be ready in 10 minutes for pick up. the receipt is being sent to your mobile device as we speak.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.
